sentences.en: From waste and death comes such incredible pulchritude. One of life’s mysteries to ponder, I guess!
sentences.cn: 从垃圾和死亡之中竟诞生出这样的美丽，我觉得，这肯定是生命深邃的奥秘之一！

sentences.en: Her dress shows her pulchritude to advantage.
sentences.cn: 她的裙子衬托出了她的美丽。

sentences.en: In my eyesight jumped into the Marktkirche in baroque style. I thought it was a beauteous exist beyond religious belief and its pulchritude stopped me from pondering any more.
sentences.cn: 巴洛克式的中心教堂跃入我的视线。我认为它是一个超越了宗教信仰的美丽存在，而它的标致阻止了我继续思考。
